headline: Sands China Celebrates 10th Anniversary of Local SME Supplier Support Programme and Hosts Supplier Excellence Awards
summary: Sands China celebrated the 10th anniversary of its Local Small, Medium and Micro Suppliers Support Programme with a ceremony Tuesday at The Londoner Macao®, together with the launch of a 10th anniversary booklet showcasing the programme's success stories. The event also featured the 2025 Sands Supplier Excellence Awards to honour outstanding suppliers, appreciation certificates to recognise long-term suppliers, and a cocktail and business networking session to further connect local businesses an

content.title: Sands China Celebrates 10th Anniversary of Local SME Supplier Support Programme and Hosts Supplier Excellence Awards
content.summary: Sands China celebrated the 10th anniversary of its Local Small, Medium and Micro Suppliers Support Programme with a ceremony Tuesday at The Londoner Macao®, together with the launch of a 10th anniversary booklet showcasing the programme's success stories. The event also featured the 2025 Sands Supplier Excellence Awards to honour outstanding suppliers, appreciation certificates to recognise long-term suppliers, and a cocktail and business networking session to further connect local businesses an

thumbnail.caption: During the 10th anniversary ceremony for the Local Small, Medium and Micro Suppliers Support Programme Tuesday, Sands China executives presented certificates of appreciation to 40 SME partners – many of whom have worked with the company for over two decades. (PRNewsfoto/Sands China Ltd.)
